cards.title: Mountain Dwarf
cards.description: A sturdy warrior from the mountains, skilled in combat and forging. His axe has tasted the blood of many enemies.
specialEffects: Armor Plating: Takes 1 less damage from all sources
Battle Rage: +2 Attack when below half health

cards.title: Arcane Wizard
cards.description: A master of the mystical arts who weaves powerful spells to control the battlefield and bend reality to his will.
specialEffects: Teleport: Can move to any position on the battlefield
Magic Missile: Deal 3 damage to any target
